title: Train fault causing delay on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Free regular bus service has ceased. We apologise for the inconvenience.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train svc resumed. Free reg bus is still available. Trains are travelling at a slower speed due to an earlier train fault.
[NSL]UPDATE: Estimated resumption time at 8:25am. Free regular bus service is still available. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
[NSL]UPDATE: Free regular bus is available between #Woodlands and #Yishun in both direction due to a train fault at #Admiralty
[NSL]: Pls add 20mins travelling time from #JurongEast to #AngMoKio towards #MarinaSouthPier due to a train fault.
